title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content: es of telling Ellyka the gith at the bridge are nothing to you. Approves of promising to rescue Duke Ravengard. Help Benryn, stuck in the fire in the Inn. Give Benryn the Dowry Persuade the Zhentarim to let you in the Hideout, (Before Rescuing Rugan or Before Rugan Reaches the Hideout) Intimidate Brem for a discount on Oskar's Freedom Approves when you give the Artist, Oskar the 200 Coin for his travel home Approves of buying Oskar Fevras Disguised as a Gith and then talk to Ellyka and say "Rela
